recipe.title: Strawberries in Red Wine
ingredients: 2 cups fruity red wine such as Santa Maddalena, Barbera, Valpolicella, Merlot, or Zinfandel
1 lb strawberries (2 pt), trimmed, and halved if large
instructions: Stir together wine, lemon juice, and sugar (to taste) in a bowl. Stir in strawberries and let macerate at room temperature 1 hour, then chill until cold, up to 1 hour but no longer. (Fruit will become too soft if it steeps for more than 2 hours.) Serve berries in small bowls with some of their juices.
